hadiths.text: It has been related that :the Prophet said: "Whoever builds a Masjid for (the sake of) Allah, be it small or large, then Allah will build a house for him in Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ بُنْيَانِ الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of Building A Masjid
